name: Human Connection
description:
Welcome to Human Connection.

This Lost Relic Game Jam game takes the theme "Connection" and puts a twist on it.

You play as a lonely scientist, plagued by the bright lights and Sentry Tanks that litter your city. Disconnect the lights, avoid the tanks, and try to make a connection with the other citizenry. Unfortunately, they won't come willingly.

This is a lite action/stealth top down kidnapper.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Left Click to Shoot/Use

Spacebar to Pause

A game by Kyle Breslow and Baker Campbell.

Special Thanks To:

Himmelfar for the environmental assets and buildings - www.artstation.com/evgeny-nikolsky.
